sentences.chinese: 我说的台语你听得懂喔？

sentences.english: Which Taigi is the typical one?
Her voice was really beautiful especially when she sings the Taiwanese touching songs.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音真的很美的，尤其是当她唱台语动人的歌曲。

sentences.english: Why is Tagi worthy for survival?
sentences.chinese: 为什么台语值得继续存活呢？

sentences.english: When will we give up Taigi or save Taigi?
sentences.chinese: 什么时候我们放弃或挽救台语呢？

sentences.english: Learned Taiwanese songs that you haven't heard yet but learned them for you.
sentences.chinese: 专门为你而学，但你还没听过台语歌。

sentences.english: My Taiwanese is more fluent than my Mandarin.
To pro-mote native language learning, the school offers Taiwanese and Tayal languages courses.
sentences.chinese: 为促进母语的学习，学校提供台语和泰雅语的课程。

sentences.english: Of course, the betel nut girls can only speak Taiwanese, so I found someone to translate for me.
sentences.chinese: 当然，槟榔西施只回说台语，所以我找了翻译。

sentences.english: What is the idiosyncracy of Taigi?

definition: Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
fashionable word or phrase/abbr. for 潮流用語|潮流用语[chao2 liu2 yong4 yu3]
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
Taishanese, a language of the Yue language group 粵語|粤语[Yue4 yu3] spoken in Jiangmen 江門|江门[Jiang1 men2] and in the Chinatowns of North America
Amis or Pangcah, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
puyuma, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
